name: Alone (itch) (Nemila)
description:
Alone By Lamine

Name : Alone

Autor : Lamine

Game engine : Game Maker Studio 2

Description : Open World Platformer Game. You are alone and are traveling in a strange world. Go to the adventure and discover new things.

Keyboard :

  • Directional keys - Move
  • Space key - Jump

Gamepad :

  • Direcional-pad - Move
  • Face button 1 - Jump
